name: sap-etd-cloud
label: SAP Enterprise Threat Detection Cloud Edition
description: SAP Enterprise Threat Detection (ETD), Cloud Edition helps you to identify the real attacks as they are happening and analyze the threats quickly enough to neutralize them before serious damage occurs. SAP Enterprise Threat Detection Cloud Edition connector performs action like get and ingest Events, Alerts and Investigations.

fields.title: Authentication URL
fields.name: authenticationURL
fields.tooltip: The Authentication URL is contained in the field `uaa.url` of the service key
fields.description: The Authentication URL is contained in the field `uaa.url` of the service key

fields.title: ETD Data Retrieval URL
fields.name: eTDDataRetrievalURL
fields.tooltip: The Authentication URL is contained in the field `url` of the service key
fields.description: The Authentication URL is contained in the field `url` of the service key

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: clientID
fields.description: The Client ID is specified in the field `client id` in the service key.
fields.tooltip: The Client ID is specified in the field `client id` in the service key.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: clientSecret
fields.description: The Client Secret is specified in the field `client secret` in the service key.
fields.tooltip: The Client Secret is specified in the field `client secret` in the service key.

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieve alerts based on start and end date/time

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the amount of results which will be returned.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the amount of results which will be returned.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Specify the date and time from which alerts should be received
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date and time from which alerts should be received

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Specify the date and time until which the alerts should be received.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date and time until which the alerts should be received.

operations.title: Get Alert Details by ID
operations.description: Get Alert detail information based on specified alert ID

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alertID
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the alert to retrieve details information.
parameters.description: Specify ID of the alert to retrieve details information.

operations.title: Get Investigations
operations.description: Get alerts with expansion and filter for investigations.

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alertID
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the alert to filter investigations for.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the alert to filter investigations for.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the limit the amount of results to retrieve
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit the amount of results to retrieve
